description: This file contains serializers and utility functions for a word-guessing game API, including request/response schemas, validation, and feedback computation.

classes.name: StartGameRequestSerializer
classes.description: Serializer for starting a new game session request.

classes.name: StartGameResponseSerializer
classes.description: Serializer for response after starting a game.

classes.name: GuessRequestSerializer
classes.description: Serializer for submitting a guess in a game session.

classes.name: GuessResponseSerializer
classes.description: Serializer for response after submitting a guess.

classes.name: SessionDetailResponseSerializer
classes.description: Serializer for retrieving detailed session info.

methods.name: _normalize_word
methods.description: Normalizes input words by stripping and converting to lowercase.

methods.name: _validate_guess_word
methods.description: Validates that a guess word is alphabetic, non-empty, and normalized.

methods.name: compute_letter_feedback
methods.description: Computes per-letter feedback (correct, present, absent) similar to Wordle rules.

methods.name: feedback_to_compact
methods.description: Converts feedback list into a compact string representation for storage.
